ğŸ›’â€ƒSecure Price Charts
Navigate to your favorite products and start tracking them from the extension popup menu. A private price chart is generated which is automatically updated.

ğŸ›’â€ƒData Security
Unlike other Amazon price trackers, this extension does not communicate with any other server other than Amazon and cannot use your bandwidth and/or IP address to send back price scraping information.

ğŸ›’â€ƒPrice drop & Availability Notifications
Set up notifications directly from the extension popup. You will be notified once the product dropped below your desired price.

ğŸ›’â€ƒDaily Deals & Coupons
This extension finds the best deals every day. Order all tracked products by the highest drop in price for quick inspection.
